body_html: Per discussion with @zdevito its probably not worth the effort of going through fixing this one corner case now. I'd rather get this checked in as it doesn't break anything, and then when someone runs into the issue of trying to use a DoubleTensor vector of probabilities we can fix it then, likely when we have better tooling for writing a custom implementation of the function, which is probably how we would want to solve things.

body: Per discussion with @zdevito its probably not worth the effort of going through fixing this one corner case now. I'd rather get this checked in as it doesn't break anything, and then when someone runs into the issue of trying to use a `DoubleTensor` vector of probabilities we can fix it then, likely when we have better tooling for writing a custom implementation of the function, which is probably how we would want to solve things.
